result.title: Report procurement practices and recommended evaluation benchmarks
result.description: This report will provide a recommended approach to the different procurement scenarios. It will provide the initial input for WP2, which in turn provides a benchmark for procurement of energy-efficient and environmentally sound data centers and related products and services, based on an assessment of the state-of-practice and the state-of-the-art, and will be supported by empirical data and by qualitative feedback.
